product_name: Darn Tough Nordic Micro Crew Cushion Socks - Women's
long_description: The women's merino wool Darn Tough Nordic Micro Crew Cushion socks are as hardworking and tenacious as the skiers they are designed for. Fine-gauge merino wool is blended with nylon and spandex for consistent warmth, breathability, durability and a great fit; wool naturally repels bacteria and odors. Layer of cushioning along the bottoms adds extra support and comfort for long days on the trails. Undetectable toe seams won't create hot spots and cause blisters. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The women's merino wool Darn Tough Nordic Micro Crew Cushion socks are as hardworking and tenacious as the skiers they are designed for.
